## Archive Notice

The Fantasy Football season has now ended, and the stats and simulation pages have been archived.

* For the final gameweek (38) stats pages you can **[<i class ="fas fa-futbol"></i> click here](archive/2017-18/index.html).**

* For the last Monte Carlo simulation (GW37) you can **[<i class ="fas fa-chart-line"></i> click here](archive/2017-18/monte_carlo.html).**

* To download the final datasets scraped from the fantasy football site in CSV format, **[<i class ="fas fa-download"></i> click here](data/data.zip).**

### Feedback

For feedback, requests or suggestions for the next season of fantasy football, please visit the project's **[<i class ="fab fa-github"></i> github repository](https://github.com/tjconstant/FantasyEPL)**, and submit an issue.

### Blog

There will be some upcoming blog posts of post-season analysis, including the effectiveness of the Monte Carlo method of predicting the winners. These will be posted at **[<i class ="fas fa-user"></i> tjconstant.com](http://tjconstant.com)**.
